responsibilities: Ongoing development and maintenance of internal data solutions with a focus on highly scalable and computationally efficient data and analytical infrastructure.
Develop, execute, and analyze ongoing and bespoke performance and portfolio analytics across attribution, portfolio construction, portfolio optimization, and risk modeling.
Conduct signal research using advanced statistical and machine learning techniques utilizing conventional and alternative data sources, including proprietary BXMA and Blackstone data.
Collaborate across other BXMA groups, including Investment teams, Operations, Treasury, and Legal.
qualifications: Advanced programming skills in Python (knowledge in C++ is a plus).
Extensive experience working with macro and asset class specific market data.
Strong interpersonal and concise communication skills.
Strong work ethic and ability to multitask.
analysis: The job responsibilities focus on the development and maintenance of data solutions, performance and portfolio analytics, signal research using statistical and machine learning techniques, and collaboration with various teams. The skills required include advanced programming in Python, experience with market data, and strong communication skills. There is no explicit mention of working with Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs) in the responsibilities or skills. The focus seems to be more on data analytics, machine learning, and financial modeling rather than on natural language processing or generative tasks typically associated with GenAI or LLMs.
